title: OnePlus One
body:
Im giving away an invite for one of these phones...if you have wanted one here it is:
https://account.oneplus.net/invite/claim/GLOK-SZEJ-FEWD-58E6
to get it to ship to australia or NZ you need to use a mail forwarding company. i recommend u use shipitto.com
goodluck hav fun
btw, 7 hours of it is gone
